Row.Text: Armorer

+8[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Exploration Military Building. Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.
[B]Effect:[/B] Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.

Exploration Diplomacy and Production Building.

+4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. Must be placed on a River.

+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] on the following Improvements in this Settlement from its [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Bonus:[BLIST][LI] Farms[LI] Pastures[LI] Plantations[/BLIST][n]Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. Must be placed on a River.

Medieval Bridge

+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Pillaged by any Flood.[N]Must be placed on a Navigable River. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Medieval Walls

Adds 100 [icon:Action_Heal] HP to the District and +15 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Exploration Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another [icon:CITY_URBAN] District with Walls or the City Center. Can only be purchased on the City Center. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Adds 100 [icon:Action_Heal] HP to the District. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.[n]Must be built adjacent to another [icon:CITY_URBAN] District with Walls or on the City Center. Can only be purchased on the City Center. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

Must be placed adjacent to Coast.[N]Chola Unique Building.

Norman Unique Culture Building and Fortification. +6 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Medieval Walls and Wonders. Ageless. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.
[B]Effect:[/B] Acts as a [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified District. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.[N]Norman Unique Building.
Motte

Norman Unique Happiness Building and Fortification. +6[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness if placed on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Rough Terrain. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness adjacency for Wonders. Ageless. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.

Casa Consistorial

Must be built in the Homelands adjacent to Coast.[N]Spanish Unique Building.

Must be built in the Homelands adjacent to Coast.[N]Spanish Unique Building.

Songhai Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Navigable Rivers and Resources. +1 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route Range. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be built on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Desert or Plains. Cannot be adjacent to another Caravanserai.

+1 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route Range. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be built on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Desert or Plains. Cannot be adjacent to another Caravanserai.[n]Songhai Unique Improvement.
Lo'i Kalo

Hawaiian Unique Improvement. +3 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Fishing Boat. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Grassland or Tropical.
Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Grassland or Tropical.[N]Hawaiian Unique Improvement.

Ming Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification Constructibles. Ageless. Counts as [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification, +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.

[B]Effect:[/B] +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units defending in the tile.[N]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] to all adjacent Buildings.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Rough Terrain without a River or Feature.[n]Incan Unique Improvement.

Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Desert.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on tiles with a natural Happiness yield.

Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Company Post.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to a [icon:CITY_URBAN] District.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Floodplains.

City-State Unique Improvement. +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for each [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Ally you have. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement in a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. One per Settlement.

Norman Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Bailey and Motte in the same District. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Cavalry Units. Receive a free [icon:UNIT_CHEVALER] Chevaler Unit when completed.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Cavalry Units. Receive a free [icon:UNIT_CHEVALER] Chevaler Unit when completed.

Abbasid Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Madrasa and Mosque in the same District. +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to all [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. Allows training the [icon:UNIT_ALIM] 'Alim in this Settlement.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to all [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City.
Plaza

Spanish Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Casa Consistorial and Casa de Contratación in the same District. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in this Settlement for every Settlement in Distant Lands. Allows training the [icon:UNIT_CONQUISTADOR] Conquistador in this Settlement.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in this Settlement for every Settlement in Distant Lands.
Pura

Majapahit Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Candi Bentar and Meru in the same District. +10% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town to a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. Receive 1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic when completed.
+10%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town to a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. Receive 1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic when completed.
Five Hundred Lords

+5 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Land Trade Route range and +15 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Naval Trade Route range.
